price: (មានគេនិយាយទៅកាន់ពួកគេថា) ចូរពួកអ្នកដើរទៅ កាន់អ្វី(នរក)ដែលពួកអ្នកធ្លាប់បានបដិសេធនឹងវាចុះ។
arabic: ٱنطَلِقُوٓاْ إِلَىٰ مَا كُنتُم بِهِۦ تُكَذِّبُونَ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: inṭaliqū ilā mā kuntum bihi tukadhibūna
